name: K3 Capital
description: K3 Capital provides institutional asset-management and DeFi strategy solutions, developing advanced on-chain products for professional investors and protocols.

name: Hyperithm
description: Hyperithm delivers institutional-grade DeFi strategies and quantitative trading solutions, bridging traditional finance with decentralized markets to maximize risk-adjusted yield.

name: TelosC
description: TelosC designs incentive, risk, credit, and coordination models that drive growth across protocol and DAO economies within the DeFi ecosystem.

name: Varlamore
description: Varlamore builds high-yield lending strategies across isolated markets such as Silo Finance, targeting stable, risk-adjusted income for DeFi participants.

name: MEV Capital
description: MEV Capital is a digital-asset manager specializing in validator operations, MEV extraction, and structured DeFi yield strategies that generate uncorrelated returns.

name: Optima
description: Optima is a financial-software and tokenization platform offering blockchain-based certificates and digital-asset investment products for regulated and institutional markets.

name: Re7 Labs
description: Re7 Labs is a research-driven DeFi asset manager focused on risk-curated vaults and restaking strategies. It builds institutional-grade yield products leveraging protocols like Morpho, EigenLayer, and Mellow.

name: Gauntlet
description: Gauntlet is a quantitative risk-management platform providing simulation-based insights and automated parameter optimization for DeFi protocols. It enables safer, more capital-efficient on-chain markets through data-driven modeling.

name: Steakhouse
description: Steakhouse Financial is a DeFi risk-curation firm that manages institutional-grade vaults and stablecoin-lending strategies focused on capital efficiency and treasury optimization.

name: Euler DAO
description: Euler DAO is a community-governed organization that advances the Euler protocol and ecosystem through on-chain proposals, voting, and ecosystem coordination.

name: Edge UltraYield
description: Edge UltraYield curates yield-generating DeFi vaults using market-neutral strategies and transparent infrastructure, aiming to make institutional-grade yield accessible through a simplified deposit experience.

name: Api3
description: Api3 builds decentralized oracle infrastructure that delivers on-chain data feeds and supports DeFi applications with first-party oracles and OEV-based incentives.

name: Sentora
description: Sentora provides institutional-grade DeFi strategies with integrated risk management, offering non-custodial vault access, analytics, and monitoring tools for professional allocators and treasuries.

name: August Digital
description: August Digital provides an institutional platform for spot, derivatives, and DeFi trading, paired with automated lending operations and risk-management software for digital-asset markets.

name: kpk
description: kpk provides non-custodial on-chain treasury and asset management, delivering curated vault strategies built on a defined risk framework with continuous monitoring and operational safeguards.

name: Clearstar
description: Clearstar Labs is an on-chain strategy curator providing qualitative-first risk curation, continuous monitoring, and distribution infrastructure to launch and scale curated DeFi vaults.

name: Yearn
description: Yearn is a battle-tested DeFi yield aggregator whose vaults automate strategy execution, harvesting, and compounding to optimize returns across DeFi opportunities.

name: Keyrock
description: Keyrock is a digital-asset market maker and liquidity provider delivering tailored liquidity solutions across centralized and decentralized trading venues.

name: Architect
description: Architect Systems deploys patient, long-horizon capital through a research-led investment approach focused on long-term outcomes.

name: Stake DAO
description: Stake DAO is a non-custodial liquid staking and yield platform focused on governance-token ecosystems, offering products and strategies designed to boost rewards and protocol alignment.

name: Avantgarde
description: Avantgarde is a DeFi-native asset manager and advisory firm providing treasury management and digital-asset investment strategies for DAOs and institutions, and is known as a founding team behind Enzyme.
